nodes.text: Eres III was a Mid Rim planet known for its Xoxin plains.
During the Battle of Eres III during the Mandalorian Wars, the Neo-Crusader army set the flammable Xoxin alight. The fields continued to burn for at least ten years after the end of the war.
Atton first mentioned of Eres III and the Xoxin Plains during the Dark Wars when asked about the Mandalorians' plunders nearly ten years earlier.
